def transform(sequence):
    sequence_list=list(sequence)
    if sequence_list[3] == '5':
        sequence_list[4]='5'
        sequence_list[5]='5'
        sequence_list[13]='5'
        sequence_list[14]='5'
        sequence_list[22]='5'
        sequence_list[23]='5'
    elif sequence_list[3] == '3':
        sequence_list[4]='3'
        sequence_list[5]='3'
        sequence_list[13]='3'
        sequence_list[14]='3'
        sequence_list[22]='3'
        sequence_list[23]='3'
    elif sequence_list[3] == '6':
        sequence_list[4]='6'
        sequence_list[5]='6'
        sequence_list[13]='6'
        sequence_list[14]='6'
        sequence_list[22]='6'
        sequence_list[23]='6'
    sequence_transformed = ''.join(sequence_list)
    return sequence_transformed

prompt.content: You are given the following sequences transitions and you are to find the pattern and write the code as a Python function "transform(sequence)" which transforms each original sequence into the transformed sequence. Respond with only the python function. Do not comment on the code.
